name: UseDotNet
description: Acquires a specific version of the .NET Core SDK from the internet or the local cache and adds it to the PATH. Additionally provides basic auth.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version Spec of the version to use.  Examples: 10.x, 10.15.1, >=10.15.0

inputs.name: auth
inputs.label: Auth
inputs.helpMarkDown: The authentication feed/service point to use

inputs.name: proxy
inputs.label: Proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not to set up the .Net ecosystem to use the agent's proxy

inputs.name: nuGetFeedType
inputs.label: NuGet Feed Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of NugetFeed used in the auth field. Can either be an internal feed or external service connection
